NO_IPO_TEXT: Currently there are no IPOs to apply.
NO_SELECTED_IPO_TEXT: Currently there are no orders placed.
IPO_MODIFY_POP_OVER_TEXT: You may modify your order once it is accepted by the exchange. Please recheck your order’s status later.
IPO_CDSL_POPOVER_LABEL:
CDSL is numeric 8 Digits + 8 Digits.
Ex. 1234567712345678
IPO_NSDL_POPOVER_LABEL:
NSDL is alphanumeric IN + 6 Digits + 8 Digits.
Ex. IN123456/12345678
IPO_DISCLAIMER_TEXT: I hereby undertake that, I have read the instructions contained in this BID cum Application Form and Red Herring Prospectus and I am/we are an eligible ASBA bidder(s) as per the applicable provisions of the SEBI (issueof Capital and Disclosure Requirement) Regulation, 2009 and agree to the
IPO_INITIAL_TEXT: The initial amount required for placing the bids at cut off price will be calculated as cap price multiplied by bid quantity.
IPO_APPLICATION_FORM_PLACE_ORDER_DISCLAI: Please review your order before clicking Confirm, modifications will only be allowed once your request is accepted by the exchange.
IPO_PLACE_ORDER_HEADING: Please confirm the details below to place your request.
IPO_WITHDRAWAL_DISCLAIMER_DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to withdraw IPO?
IPO_NOT_ALLOWED_TO_WITHDRAWAL_DISCLAIMER: Your order amount is greater than 2lac, so order can not be withdraw.
IPO_PLACE_ORDER_DISCLAIMER_TEXT:
1. Your account will be lien marked for the highest bid value, which means the final amount to be debited will be blocked until the allotment process is complete.
2. In case of partial or no allotment the remaining blocked amount will be released back to your bank account once the allotment process is complete.
3. The IPO Application is available till 3 pm IST on the last day of the IPO offer period.
4. The investment will be done in the name of logged in user and not as per account holding pattern.
5. One application per PAN in IPO as per SEBI/HO/CFD/DIL2/CIR/P/2018/138 circular dated November 1, 2018.
6. Investor up to application amount of ₹200,000 will be treated as Retail Individual Investor and above ₹200,000 as HNI application.
IPO_NOT_ALLOWED_TO_APPLY_DESCRIPTION: You have already created the same order. You may modify it.
IPO_ALLOTMENT_POPUP_VALUE_TOOLTIP: ‘Value’ indicates allotted amount which is under Allotted status. In case of any other status, this field then refers to highest bid value.
IPO_APPLICATION_NUMBER_TOOL_TIP: Use your application number to verify your bids on stock exchange bidding system.
IPO_NOT_ABLE_TO_MODIFY_ERROR: Downward modification is not allowed if applied amount is more than 2 lakhs.
NSDL_TOOLTIP:
NSDL is alphanumeric IN + 6 Digits + 8 Digits.
Ex. IN123456/12345678
CDSL_TOOLTIP:
CDSL is numeric 8 Digits + 8 Digits.
Ex. 1234567712345678
DEMAT_ACCOUNT_DELETE_CONFIRMATION_MESSAG: Are you sure you want to delete?
NICK_NAME_EXIST: Uh-oh! This nick name is already in use. Please try again with a different nick name.
ACCOUNT_NUMBER_EXIST: Uh-oh! Looks like this demat account number is already in use. Please try again with a different DPID or Client ID.
BID_VALUE_ERROR_MSG: Your bid amount is greater than or equal to 2 lac, so new bid amount should be greater than current bid amount.
BID_VALUE_ERROR_MSG_FOR_ZERO_VALUE: Bid amount should be greater than 0
MODIFY_BID_ERROR: Your bid amount is greater than or equal to 2 lac, so new bid amount should be greater than current bid amount.
INVEST_IN_OUR_CURATED_MUTUAL_FUNDS: Invest in our curated mutual fund
FUNDS_RESEARCHED_FOR_DIFFERENT_RISK: Funds researched and curated for different risk appetites
DEBIT_FREEZE_MESSAGE: Your account is currently in debit freeze. Visit nearest branch to remove debit freeze
HNI_DISCLAIMER_TEXT: Investor up to application amount of ₹200,000 will be treated as Retail Individual Investor and above ₹200,000 as HNI application.
NCD_DISCLAIMER_TEXT: Your account will be lien marked for the total application value, which means the final amount to be debited will be blocked until the allotment process is complete.
SAME_BID_ERROR_DESCRIPTION: Bids cannot have same price & quantity.
IPO_APPLICATION_FORM_PLACE_ORDER_TWO_LAC: Since your application amount is greater than 2 lacs, following is not permitted:

i) Application withdrawal
ii) Any modification leading to reduction in application amount
IPO_FETCH_DEMAT_ACCOUNT_NUMBER_TOOL_TIP: Tap here to Select/add/delete Demat account details. Latest Demat account number added will be prefilled for future application.
NCD_PLACE_ORDER_DISCLAIMER: Bid Modification/ Deletion of any series in existing application will not be allowed
SAME_INVESTOR_CATEGORY_APPLIED_BEFORE_ER: You have already placed an order against the same investor category.
